attributes.action: Launch an inquiry into the launch of the new thameslink timetable
attributes.background:
On 20th May Thameslink launched their new timetable. With hundreds of trains being delayed in the first week and commuters being stranded when train after train was cancelled.

No explanation has been given as to why the trains were cancelled or delayed and no apology has been forthcoming.

rejection.details:
We think that this petition is similar: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/220440
